name: One Night Two Crazies
description: Enjoy a simple, fun, and occasionally frightening simulation. Fun for all ages provided you can handle the scares. No gore, no violence. Just girlish yells followed immediately by nervous laughter.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 Processor: 2.5 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X9.0 Compatible Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 151 MB available space Sound Card: Yes

reviews.review_text: Very cringy, not very fun. 0/10 IGN

The hate on this game I don't get. It's fun. I want to you try to make a game haters. Keep up the great work! But I have one problem. If you exit the game and go back in it does not save your night. Please add a saving system.
